Hi, thanks for your interest in Leadfoot! Please note that this repository has
been deprecated, and any webdriver-related feature requests should be made in
the Intern issue tracker (https://github.com/theintern/intern/issues). You can
still file bug reports for the latest version of Leadfoot, though.

We'd like to keep this issue tracker focused on project development, so we ask
that issues only be opened here for bug reports. If you have a question about
how to use Leadfoot, we'd prefer you ask it on Stack Overflow or in our Gitter
room (https://gitter.im/theintern/intern).
